results.name: Bisection of A287729.
comment: A287732(n)/a(n) enumerates all reduced fractions along the Stern-Brocot Tree. See the Serov link below.
link: I. V. Serov, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..8192
I. V. Serov, The Stern-Brocot Tree as Sequence A287732/A287731
N. J. A. Sloane, Stern-Brocot or Farey Tree
Index entries for sequences related to Stern's sequences
formula: Consider for n > 1 the binary expansion b(1:t) of n-1 without the leading 1.
Recurse: c=s=1; for j=1:t {if b(t-j+1) == mod(t,2) s = s+c; else c = c+s;}
Then: c = a(n) and s = A287732(n);
program: def c(n): return 1 if n==1 else s(n/2) if n%2==0 else s((n - 1)/2) + s((n + 1)/2)
def s(n): return 0 if n==1 else c(n/2) if n%2==0 else c((n - 1)/2) + c((n + 1)/2)
def a(n): return c(2*n - 1) # _Indranil Ghosh_, Jun 08 2017
results.author: _I. V. Serov_, Jun 01 2017
